snippet.title: The Wolf's Bite: Trailer
snippet.description:
The Wolf's Bite is a competitive multiplayer choose-your-own-adventure game with an entrepreneurial fairy tale twist. The game revolves around thwarting the other player while advancing your agenda. You have one week to make or break the Wolf's latest venture, The Wolf's Bite Restaurant. Will it flourish or will it fail, like the Wolf's previous residential demolition business?

UPDATE: The game launches on August 28th! Please follow and wishlist us on Steam :)
http://store.steampowered.com/app/656040/The_Wolfs_Bite/

http://thewolfsbite.com
https://twitter.com/thewolfsbite
